Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener
MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener
Handles playback of MP3 songs using the JLayer library. Provides functionality to play, pause, and stop songs, as well as manage song playback state.

    • loadSong

      public void loadSong(Song song)
      Loads a song and starts playback immediately if a valid song is provided.
      Parameters:
      song - the song to be loaded

    • pauseSong

      public void pauseSong()
      Pauses the currently playing song. Stops playback and marks the player as paused.

    • stopSong

      public void stopSong()
      Stops the currently playing song. Terminates the AdvancedPlayer instance and resets it.

    • playCurrentSong

      public void playCurrentSong()
      Plays the currently loaded song from the beginning or resumes it from a paused state.

    • playbackStarted

      public void playbackStarted(javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackEvent evt)
      Called when playback starts. Logs a message indicating that playback has started.

      Parameters:
